title: Abstract Wiki Frame: Narrative list / enumeration

frame_type.description: Canonical frame identifier for the list / enumeration family. In the global frame inventory this corresponds to "aggregate.list_enumeration".

subject.description: Optional main subject that owns or is characterized by the list (e.g. a ministry that has departments, a product that has features). Shape follows semantics.types.Entity.

relation_lemma.description: Optional lemma-level label for the list relation between subject and items, e.g. 'have', 'include', 'consist_of', 'offer'. Used for patterns like 'X has A, B, and C'.

group_label_lemma.description: Optional lemma-level label naming the group or collection as a whole, e.g. 'department', 'branch', 'product', 'feature', 'species'.

scope_entity.description: Optional entity defining the scope of the enumeration (e.g. 'in the EU', 'within the company'). Shape follows semantics.types.Entity.

items.description: Items in the list or enumeration. Each item may be an entity, a concept, or a mixed slot with both an entity and a label.

entity.description: Optional entity representing this item (e.g. a department, product, or person). Shape follows semantics.types.Entity.

label.description: Optional short label or name for the item, if modelling it as a full entity is not needed.

category_lemma.description: Optional lemma-level category for this item (e.g. 'film', 'novel', 'river', 'island') when items fall into subtypes.

order_index.description: Optional explicit order index for this item within the list, if a particular ordering should be preserved.

is_primary.description: Optional flag marking this item as primary or especially important within the list.

note.description: Optional short note or gloss about this specific item, e.g. a key property or disambiguating descriptor.

attributes.description: Optional lightly structured attribute bag specific to this item (e.g. {'population': 100000, 'year_established': 1950}).

ordering_dimension_lemma.description: Optional lemma-level label for the dimension along which items are implicitly ordered (e.g. 'size', 'importance', 'chronology').

conjunction_lemma.description: Optional lemma-level label for the conjunction preferred when listing items, e.g. 'and', 'or'. Engines may override based on language defaults.

summary_gloss.description: Optional short, language-specific gloss describing the intended list narrative (e.g. 'the main departments are...'). Engines may ignore or rephrase this.

attributes.description: Free-form attribute bag for additional structured information not yet promoted to first-class fields (e.g. numeric counts, coverage flags).

extra.description: Reserved for pipeline- or source-specific metadata that should not affect generation but may be useful for debugging or analysis.

elements.description: Legacy field: list of items in the enumeration. Prefer 'items' for new data.

list_kind.description: Legacy field: textual description of the list kind (e.g. 'departments', 'members'). Prefer 'group_label_lemma' and 'relation_lemma'.
